name: Space Escape (Wes Casto)
description:
Space Escape

This is my first game jam entry! Made in 14 days for LOWREZJAM 2022.

Controls
  • Move - Arrows
  • Shoot - Space
  • Use - Enter
How to Play
  1. Find and activate the 4 beacons
  2. Go to the landing zone
  3. Survive and extract
Game Jam Details

The resolution of the game must be no larger than 64x64 pixels. There were 10 optional themes announced when the jam started, but I didn't end up using any of them. 

Software

Made with Godot and Aseprite. Music and sound effects from OpenGameArt.org.

Known Issues
  • Text is not displaying properly when in full screen
